statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_type='buy'
SELECT * FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_type='sell' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT item_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM inventory_transactions GROUP BY item_name
SELECT * FROM inventory_transactions WHERE player_id=1001 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT transaction_id, item_name, transaction_date FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM inventory_transactions WHERE player_id = 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM inventory_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT DISTINCT item_name FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'sell'
SELECT player_id, item_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM inventory_transactions GROUP BY player_id, item_name ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT player_id, transaction_type, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%apple%' AND quantity < 5;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_type FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Transactions ON Inventory.item_id = Transactions.player_id WHERE quantity > 5 AND amount > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY item_name HAVING SUM(quantity) > 20;
SELECT * FROM inventory_table WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_table WHERE item_name LIKE 'Sword%'
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_table GROUP BY player_id
SELECT * FROM transaction_table WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT player_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM virtual_currency_table GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_table WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_table WHERE price < 50 AND item_name LIKE '%sword%'
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_table WHERE item_name IN ('Potion', 'Shield', 'Sword') ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_table WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT player_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM virtual_currency_table GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_balance > 500
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT user_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE condition='new';
SELECT user_id, item_name FROM inventory ORDER BY last_used DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_used DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT item_name, quantity, condition FROM inventory WHERE condition = 'new'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT world_id, world_name, owner_id FROM virtual_worlds WHERE owner_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT player_name, coins FROM players WHERE coins >= 1000;
SELECT world_name, population FROM virtual_worlds WHERE population > 50000;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, coins FROM players WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY coins DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC
SELECT world_name, population FROM virtual_worlds WHERE population > 1000 ORDER BY population DESC
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1 ORDER BY currency_name
